org.apache.taverna.server.master.interfaces

Interface Directory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<DirectoryEntry>, DirectoryEntry

    public interface Directory
extends DirectoryEntry
    Represents a directory that is the working directory of a workflow run, or a sub-directory of it.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
    See Also:
    File

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Directory.ZipStream
      A simple pipe that produces the zipped contents of a directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<DirectoryEntry> getContents() 
      Directory.ZipStream getContentsAsZip() 
      Collection<DirectoryEntry> getContentsByDate() 
      File makeEmptyFile(Principal actor, String name)
      Creates an empty file in this directory.
      Directory makeSubdirectory(Principal actor, String name)
      Creates a sub-directory of this directory.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.taverna.server.master.interfaces.DirectoryEntry

        destroy, getFullName, getModificationDate, getName

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • Method Detail

      • getContents

        Collection<DirectoryEntry> getContents()
                                throws FilesystemAccessException
        Returns:
        A list of the contents of the directory.
        Throws:
        FilesystemAccessException - If things go wrong.

      • getContentsByDate

        Collection<DirectoryEntry> getContentsByDate()
                                      throws FilesystemAccessException
        Returns:
        A list of the contents of the directory, in guaranteed date order.
        Throws:
        FilesystemAccessException - If things go wrong.

      • getContentsAsZip

        Directory.ZipStream getContentsAsZip()
                              throws FilesystemAccessException
        Returns:
        The contents of the directory (and its sub-directories) as a zip.
        Throws:
        FilesystemAccessException - If things go wrong.

      • makeSubdirectory

        Directory makeSubdirectory(Principal actor,
                           String name)
                    throws FilesystemAccessException
        Creates a sub-directory of this directory.
        Parameters:
        actor - Who this is being created by.
        name - The name of the sub-directory.
        Returns:
        A handle to the newly-created directory.
        Throws:
        FilesystemAccessException - If the name is the same as some existing entry in the directory, or if something else goes wrong during creation.

      • makeEmptyFile

        File makeEmptyFile(Principal actor,
                   String name)
            throws FilesystemAccessException
        Creates an empty file in this directory.
        Parameters:
        actor - Who this is being created by.
        name - The name of the file to create.
        Returns:
        A handle to the newly-created file.
        Throws:
        FilesystemAccessException - If the name is the same as some existing entry in the directory, or if something else goes wrong during creation.
